apple_vendor_description: This romantic emoji on Apple devices features a tender kiss between a man with a light skin tone and a woman with a medium-light skin tone, their faces close in an affectionate moment. Apple's signature 3D rendering gives their features soft, rounded edges and realistic lighting that emphasizes the warmth and intimacy of their embrace. It's a beautiful depiction of love and romance, often used to express affection and close relationships within digital conversations on Apple devices.
